vendorForm.AddVendorDrawer_VendorType_container: Select the vendor type from the dropdown.
vendorForm.AddVendorDrawer_CountryId_container: Select the country from the dropdown.
vendorForm.AddVendorDrawer_StateId_container: Select the state from the dropdown.
vendorForm.AddVendorDrawer_CityId_container: Select the city from the dropdown.
vendorForm.AddVendorDrawer_AddressLine1: Enter the address line 1 if necessary.
vendorForm.AddVendorDrawer_AddressLine2: Enter the address line 2 if necessary.
vendorForm.AddVendorDrawer_Cancel: Click here to go-back to the vendor listing.
vendorForm.AddVendorDrawer_Save: Click here to save the vendor.
